title: MXGP PRO [ENG|Multi6] (2018) PC | RePack by R.G. Freedom
description:
Year: 06/29/2018
Genre: race, simulator, sport
Developer:  Milestone S.r.l.
Publisher:  Milestone S.r.l.
Interface language:  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Brazilian | Program for changing the language in the game (copy to the root folder of the game and run):
Voice language: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Brazilian
Game version: 1.0
Publication type: RePack
Tablet: Enclosing (CODEX)


System requirements:


✓ OS: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
✓ Processor: Intel Core i5-2500, AMD FX-8100 or equivalent
✓ RAM: 8 GB
✓ Video: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 with 2 GB VRAM or more / AMD Radeon HD 7950 with 2 GB VRAM or more
✓ DirectX: 11
✓ HDD: 13 Gb
✓ Additionall: *Laptop versions of graphics cards may work but are not officially supported.


Description:


The official game of the motocross championship is back! Download MXGP PRO and participate in MXGP as a professional.
Modify the motorcycle by adjusting the suspension, brakes and gas.
Experiment with physics PRO.
Explore the Range or compete with AI. Train in 30 tests and master the techniques of real riders!
Create a rider and start a career in MX2. Be glorified, attract sponsors and become the champion of MXGP!
All official tracks and racers of the 2017 season are waiting for you! Ready for testing?


Features repack:
1. Based on the release of CODEX;
2. Do not cut anything;
3. Nothing is recoded;
4. Installation time: ~ 15 minutes;
5. Tested on Windows 10 (x64) Professional;
6. RePack from R.G. Freedom
